name: Daikatana
description:
Daikatana is an action-puzzle game developed by Will. It came out on 01-01-2000. Kotobuki System Co. published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Daikatana on Game Boy Color.
(GBC), Kelly Hoerner, Mitsuo Shinjo and Seijiro Okuhara produced the game. (GBC), John Romero, small and Takeo Mogi directed the game. It was scored by Al Chaney, Hideki Sakamoto, Robert Owens and Stan Neuvo.
